sect1.title: Updating Bugzilla
sect1.para: When a new package is released by its maintainers, we mark this in Bugzilla. You don't need to update the book right after a package is released, but at least announce it.
We have a special bug for packages updates, Bug #30. All package update bugs are individual bugs, but they are all linked to Bug 30. Bug 30 is the parent bug so to speak.

listitem.para: Go to Bug #30's Dependency Tree at
Find the package that was just updated in this list and click on its link (the link text will be crossed out (ie: a line through it which means it's currently a fixed bug).
Update the Summary field to reflect the new available version.
Select the Reopen bug radio button.
